aboutFaqs.question: Do you only work with travel agents?
aboutFaqs.answer: Travel is my specialty, but I also work with service-based businesses—coaches, consultants, small agencies—who face similar operational challenges.

aboutFaqs.question: What tools do you use?
aboutFaqs.answer: Primarily ClickUp for project management, Claude AI for intelligent automation, and custom integrations. I recommend tools based on your specific needs, not what pays me the highest affiliate commission.

aboutFaqs.question: Do I need to be tech-savvy to work with you?
aboutFaqs.answer: No. I build systems for people who don't want to think about technology. You'll get training and documentation, and the goal is always simplicity.

aboutFaqs.question: Where are you based?
aboutFaqs.answer: I work remotely with clients worldwide. Most of my clients are in the US, but I've worked with agencies in Canada, UK, and Australia.

aboutFaqs.question: How did you get into this?
aboutFaqs.answer: I spent years as a travel coordinator building the systems that nobody else wanted to build. Eventually I realized the systems were more valuable than any single trip I could book.
